name: The curse of Pinnacle Valley
description:
Your friend asked you a favor, you must give him a powerful weapon in the other side of a cursed village called  Pinnacle Valley , where nonthing works as it´s seems. 

Controls:

[WASD] Move 

 [Space] Jump 

 [Left mouse button] Hold items, shoot bullets 

 [Right mouse button] Throw items 

[E] Open doors

[R] to reset levels 

 [Esc] Main menu

[Ctrl] Switch fullscreen
